snippet: On his climb of Mount Kilimanjaro, Mets pitcher R.A. Dickey meets the challenge of the Barranco Wall. The summit is next.
abstract: On his climb of Mount Kilimanjaro, Mets pitcher R.A. Dickey meets the challenge of the Barranco Wall. The summit is next.
lead_paragraph: R. A. Dickey, the Mets pitcher, is climbing Mount Kilimanjaro this month to raise awareness for the Bombay Teen Challenge, an organization that rescues and cares for women and girls in Mumbai who are at risk of being abused and exploited. His posts will appear occasionally in Bats.

headline.main: A Dangerous Challenge - and the Summit in Sight
